feed.title: Yen-Lin Wu
feed.subtitle: An enthusiastic and amateur cyclist based in Taipei, Taiwan.

entry.title: My first post
entry.content:
I have started my personal blog here in pursuit of keeping track of my workout habits.

In Feburary 2023, I decided to return to Taiwan after roaming around in Japan and The Netherlands for alsmot 9 years. I developed a habit of cycling previously in The Netherlands from a gravel bike- Cannondale Topstone 2L.
entry.summary: I have started my personal blog here in pursuit of keeping track of my workout habits.
